website_summaries.verdict: Long bat that's made for small ball hitting drills, and ships with practice balls so you can start immediately.
pros: Useful for drills to improve the players' hand/eye coordination with a small diameter bat barrel and small practice balls
Lightweight aluminum design at 12 oz., so players can run the drill repeatedly without tiring out
At 30" in length, it's made for improving bat speed more than power
cons: Not made for use with real baseballs
Probably too long for really young players

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Its as advertised...however, it only seems to strengthen and develop skills when the kids use it. Otherwise it's a dust magnet in the garage. Do they sell better kids on here somewhere? What section is that...home and business? Or like Amazon Warehouse Deals?
customer_reviews.author: Shan^2

customer_reviews.title: Powerstick model
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Used by 10 and 12 yr old, in basement with tee and net, and skilz pitching machine. Few days use bumped twelve year old up 10mph at cages. Had trouble with 60mph most times. First trip back, he cracked first 5 pitches on 60, no problem. Usually, asks to drop down and never did this last trip.
customer_reviews.author: mg

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly balanced baseball stick..
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to get into the swing of things while being at home. I was looking at baseball bats, but came across this baseball stick. The stick is better than a bat aesthetically. Perfect to implement some movements with the swing of the stick. It's a good weight at 30 ounces. The materially is sturdy. The stick can be banged around. It came with three plastic golf sized balls that I will not be using.
customer_reviews.author: J Dong

customer_reviews.title: Excellent training bat
customer_reviews.text: This heavy stick is great for hitting practice. The contrast of this versus the 'normal' SKLZ stick bat allows you to work on several different aspects of your mechanics as well as building up hand strength and speed. The skinny barrel swinging at the small balls also works to focus the hand-eye coordination. If you buy this, pick up another pack of the SKLZ small balls because the three balls that come with this don't last long.
customer_reviews.author: J. WILSON

customer_reviews.title: It worth it
customer_reviews.text: The boy loves it, in the past month his swing has improved, the hand eye coordination has improved. So has his timing. Only reason it receives 4 stars is because it comes with 4 balls. But I bought a pack of 50 for 8 bucks, so it worked out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and good training aid
customer_reviews.text: Know this is the lighter bat. I would recommend this one and the heavier bat. Great training aid
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for improving eye movement on the baseball
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my team in November and I have seen great improvement on the way my players follow pitches and make contact with the ball. The bat is the perfect weight for my U10 players and is a durable piece that hasn't dented or shown wear. I would highly suggest purchasing the SKLZ Mini Impact Balls to go with this bat. The wiffle balls that come with the bat are a little brittle and don't resist wear as well as the impact balls. If you are looking to help your child (or players) improve on their hitting, this is a great tool to help them become better at the plate.
customer_reviews.author: The Herd

customer_reviews.title: This product really works
customer_reviews.text: This is no joke. My 10yr old son was struggling at the plate and lacked power. I purchased this product and threw about a thousand balls to him over a two week period. He hit 2 home runs (his first ever) in the next game after praticing intensely with this product. Think about it.. the pipe is much thinner than a bat, it weighes more than 11oz more than his bat and he has to hit golf ball sized wiffle balls that are 1/4th the size of a baseball moving oddly through the air. Simple yet genius. Don't let the reviews about this just being a piece of pipe stop you from buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Should come with more balls
customer_reviews.text: The bat is heavy enough, very solid yet (purposely) thin and we enjoy training with it, but three balls just isn't enough to get a good workout in versus spending time retrieving the balls
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Good training tool
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this two years ago for my son at 14. It definitely is worth it. Purchased the 30oz stick. It feels like a regular bat for him and his (baseball) friends love it. They love it so much that they play baseball with the SKLZ balls in the backyard every time they come over or to get some BP. He still uses it today for pre-BP in HS.
customer_reviews.author: cytylee27

customer_reviews.title: Exact Description
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it, and it helps eye and hand coordination. I used this when I played, when I was younger, It helps so much that I wanted my girls to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Slotterback

customer_reviews.title: Good training tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool to help increase bat velocity and control. Helped balance out my son's swing to give him increased power through the strike zone.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gaskins

customer_reviews.title: Nice practicing bat
customer_reviews.text: Nice practicing bat. The weight is great. But dont really recommend for anyone younger than 7. But this helped my son a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: will help
customer_reviews.text: Helps kid keep eye on ball. Takes a while but it works. Buy more little balls.
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln V

customer_reviews.title: Add me to the fan list.
customer_reviews.text: SKLZ makes great products. Period. My kids love batting against the Quick Stick and I do as well. It's pretty rewarding to slap a plastic golfball across the lawn! (Oh, and it improves their skills too.) One thing to note: I was surprised with how nice the quality of the grip, balance and overall design is. This is an actual bat -- not a plastic toy... 5/5 would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Conner

customer_reviews.title: Great training tool
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the quality of this bat, which is really the only question when it comes to deciding on a tool like this. Paint is nice and the grip feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Quality metal practice tool. Very solid and has the ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality metal practice tool. Very solid and has the handle that duplicates a regular bat. Helps improve bat speed and hand-eye coordination.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great training aid
customer_reviews.text: Great training bat! An actual legit bat! Make sure and get the small skill training wiffles too!
customer_reviews.author: zac

customer_reviews.title: Improved hand eye coordination.
customer_reviews.text: Much improved hand eye coordination after using. Helps to center ball with bay
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Improvement for a little guy
customer_reviews.text: Came early and in good shape. It does help my little guy! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Jack Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great youth drill
customer_reviews.text: This is s great tool for youth players, see your averages go up after a little use.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Strengthen those shoulders
customer_reviews.text: This is a good option for a young baseball player to use to strengthen their shoulders
customer_reviews.author: William H. Parks Jr.

customer_reviews.title: 13 yr old son loves it
customer_reviews.text: my son asks me to pitch to him every day. i'm not going to make any guarantees that'll improve your swing. the two plastic balls that come with it are a joke. HIGHLY recommend buying a bag of the SKLZ impact small practice balls
customer_reviews.author: P. WALTER

customer_reviews.title: It's like the broomstick baseball from when I was a kid
customer_reviews.text: It's like the broomstick baseball from when I was a kid. Really improves contact as it forces the batter to truly watch the ball make contact.
customer_reviews.author: Big Red

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR PRACTICE SWINGS
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT FOR SOFTTOSS AND BUCKET OF COLORED OF SMALL GOLF BALL FOAM BALLS TO ID COLOR AND MAKE CONTACT WITH TRAINING BAT THIS WORKED VERY GREAT THEY CALL OUT COLOR AND MAKE CONTACT EYE HAND CORDINATION SWING TIMMING...
customer_reviews.author: DARRELL F. FLOREZ

customer_reviews.title: Must have for aspiring baseball players
customer_reviews.text: Great product for hand-eye coordination. Want to reduce your young athlete’s strikeouts and put the ball in play this season? This product and the SKLZ Quickstick are a must have!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. She looks forward to using it ant her contact with the ball had definitely improved. The bat is very tough not even a chip after a full season of practice and traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Bret R

customer_reviews.title: Is good for hand eye coordination and the kids like it
customer_reviews.text: Is good for hand eye coordination and the kids like it, But the bat, although heavy, is evenly weighted and does not seem as heavy. I actually have them using heavy wooden bats and hitting the small balls as well
customer_reviews.author: guido13

customer_reviews.title: Probably better or larger kids.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. It is very tough but I don't find it as useful as the sklz quick bat. It might be more helpful for a larger player. At this point it is just to heavy for my group.
customer_reviews.author: Bret R

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it. It is skinny to give extra practice hitting with the center of the bat. The kids loving hitting wiffle balls.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fillat

customer_reviews.title: Great Training Tool
customer_reviews.text: Great training tool. My 8 year old son volunteers to train with this in the back yard, good weight and good length for training.
customer_reviews.author: normalguy

customer_reviews.title: Works fine and teaches coordination with good results
customer_reviews.text: Works fine and teaches coordination with good results. I wish that it were more end weighted to simulate the feel of a full size bat.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent B.

customer_reviews.title: Another great product by SKLZ
customer_reviews.text: Another great product by SKLZ, my nine year old uses this while I throw him small golf see waffle balls to build his batting swing, great tool for strength and accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Currie

customer_reviews.title: We ordered this for our 13 year old son. ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our 13 year old son. He loves it. He feels it has already helped him with batting accuracy, enabling him to hit the real balls farther.
customer_reviews.author: outlivemylife

customer_reviews.title: good hitting tool
customer_reviews.text: I coach a 12U girl's team and they all like using this bat with the small yellow golf ball style SKLZ balls. Will definitely be a challenge at first for most but they get the hang of it quickly and get not only good hand-eye coordination practice but added hitting confidence. Plus, its so light weight that they can take many swings with no fatigue and then jump into the cage and hit regular softballs without getting tired.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Pantano

customer_reviews.title: Great training bat
customer_reviews.text: Great training bat. The light weight allows for plenty of swings. My eight year old uses this with the SKLZ mini training balls and there has been a tremendous improvement in his hitting ability.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Richard

customer_reviews.title: Good bat
customer_reviews.text: Great bat, no complaints at all. My son uses it and has gotten noticeably better and strength is better with his swing.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Great to create a hitter.
customer_reviews.text: I am working with my 5 year old with this and he is already hitting great. Even the golf ball size balls that come with it.
customer_reviews.author: North

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Impact balls provided with the bat is already broken/damaged with few hits.
customer_reviews.author: vsramancal

customer_reviews.title: Very. Good tool for hand eye
customer_reviews.text: Been coaching for 15 years like this tool alot right weight and great for soft toss then move to light pitch

customer_reviews.title: Great training bat for my kid
customer_reviews.text: Great training bat for my kid. Nothing else to say.

customer_reviews.title: My 10yr old loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 10yr old son loves it! We set up a hitting net in the basement and he uses his Skilz bat almost every morning. :)

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.text: Great tool our boys love the challenge. There hitting has improved tremendously.

customer_reviews.text: This really does work. My daughter was in a slump with her batting and we tried this.....she's now hitting everything !!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: Power Stick
customer_reviews.text: Great looking stick and is quite heavy. It takes a little getting use to but I have seen improvements with my sons swing since using it.

customer_reviews.title: training
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two sons and their friends. Neighborhood kids love this training bat.. All the kids in the neighborhood love this.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product came quickly and my son likes to use it. Helps his swing.

customer_reviews.text: I order this about a week ago and I have seen great improvement in my sons batting. I highly recommend this power stick.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool for improving hand eye coordination. I use it all the time in drills and pregame warm ups with my 5-6 year old Shetland players.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great with wiffle balls. Good for indoor batting drills.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this bat, it has helped me get my hand eye contact better and it helped get my bat speed up

customer_reviews.title: Good training product
customer_reviews.text: Improves hand/eye coordination. Worked this bat into practice with my son's team and all the players improved their bat/ball contact in the first session (50 swing sessions each). For some reason the description of this bat indicates that it is adjustable in length. It is not. But at 12 oz. the length is irrelevant.
customer_reviews.author: WPN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for skills practice. Use for my itching machine team of 7-8 years old. Helps for repetitive practice.

customer_reviews.title: Increased Pop!
customer_reviews.text: Only used twice, but my 11 y/o daughter hit a ball farther in a scrimmage than she has ever previously hit, after using for the first time. Seems to be improving contact and power. She really likes using it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent training tool and great value typical of SKLZ products.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bat
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and weight. My 5 yr old plays with it almost everyday. It has stood up very well over the months.
customer_reviews.author: Life is good in Florida!

customer_reviews.title: Great training tool!
customer_reviews.text: I use this bat along with the lightning rod and the power stick to teach my kid proper technique and hitting mechanics. This is a great tool for little ones who get tired fast, but still want to learn.

customer_reviews.title: the power stick has been a great training tool for my 8yr old son
customer_reviews.text: the power stick has been a great training tool for my 8yr old son, we've had it for a week and already seeing improvement in bat speed at practice.

customer_reviews.text: nice bat to improve your swing and get plenty of practice in since the bat is very light. Very good for wiffleballs.

customer_reviews.title: Training nessesity
customer_reviews.text: Great training set. Great quality and price is right. Much better set then what is sold at our local sports store.

customer_reviews.title: Get it... get it now
customer_reviews.text: This thing is SWEET and very humbling when an adult uses it... always funny to watch them wiff

customer_reviews.title: Great for practice
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good tool and makes for good practices in little league. Kids will have fun and enjoy learning how to get quick hands with this.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bat!
customer_reviews.text: Nice way to work on accuracy as well as underload vs overload training.

customer_reviews.title: Solid hand/eye coordination tool
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7-year old to help him work on seeing the ball and practicing his mechanics. Works famously. I switch up between the smaller golf ball-sized whiffles and the regulation baseball-sized ones.
customer_reviews.author: J. W. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The bat works perfect it is similar to the same weight as a high school bat which helps the hitters work their eye hand coordination better than the other bat which is lighter and made of a light metal.
customer_reviews.author: R. Magera

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for increasing bat speed and power. A must have for youth.
customer_reviews.author: Heath Bohman

customer_reviews.title: Better hand eye cordination.
customer_reviews.text: The smaller diameter bat and smaller ball (Three included and more can be purchased) will help any level ballplayer improve their hitting. The bat is also weighted in a way that bat speed can be increased with consistent use. This bat challenges a hitter in the same swing path and using the same muscles as a game swing, so the hitter will develop "muscle memory".
customer_reviews.author: Glenn A. Mumpower

customer_reviews.title: great for practice
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my 12U team and they are improving their strength with it. Would recommend to any coach.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Pantano

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great item and super fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! It’s a great item and super fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: power stick
customer_reviews.text: both my son really like to practice with the power stick, it will really make them better hitters. I would reccommend strongly.
customer_reviews.author: dsilva

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to practice hand and eye coordination. Trying to hit a ping pong ball sized ball with a skinny bat is definitely good practice. We also use this bat for warming up on deck since it's heavier than a normal bat. It's similar weight to using a "donut ring" on your bat. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Horseneck Jake

customer_reviews.title: BOOM stick
customer_reviews.text: only 4 stars because i'm not a major leaguer. its good. buy it. not sure i'd use it on regular baseballs.
customer_reviews.author: L. Westbrook

customer_reviews.title: Great training aid
customer_reviews.text: Perfect training aid for young ballplayer. Weight of bat helps develop strength & muscle memory. Size of the bat hones hand eye coordination when used in conjunction with the small balls. If you can consistently hit the small balls with this bat, regulation sized balls with a lighter full sized aluminum bat are much easier to handle. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John Torrence

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tool to help with speed of hands and works on better making contact point.
customer_reviews.author: Michael thorne

customer_reviews.title: Very good item
customer_reviews.text: Great value and quality. Our grandson loves using it to get ready for his games. His friends use it often also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sticke to warm up and cool down with
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend it to anyone. Fits in any bat bag along along side of your bats. Great inexpensive gift
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Does The Trick
customer_reviews.text: A good practice bat is light, sturdy, and durable. This bat which is adjustable keeps the long bat well intact for my personal usages for practice. 11 Ounces is more than a third lighter than a regular bat. That means more practice with more swings.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Jester

customer_reviews.title: Nice training tool
customer_reviews.text: This bat is nice for loosening up, and taking swings with a heavy bat. Helps promote adding power to your swing. Nice addition to the bat bag.
customer_reviews.author: MicrosoftApple

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For hitting
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product that works well with my 6 year older and my 12 year older to improve there hitting. I would highly recommend this if you are looking to improve bat swing and hand eye cordination.
customer_reviews.author: stephen m skarren

customer_reviews.title: Excellent training tool
customer_reviews.text: Increases batting speed and strength. Use it with my 8U baseball team and have seen marked improvements
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great training tool for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with my daughter in mind to help strengthen her swing. I definitely think this really helped improve her power and got her arms a little stronger for her at bats. Looking forward to seeing more results this coming spring, as she uses this more and more.
customer_reviews.author: dieselak

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 6 and 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 6 and 9 year old. Trying to increase their power and bat speed. Combined this with pitching machine that delivers golf ball sized foam balls. Skinny Bat + Small Baseball = improved hand-eye coordination.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Very effective to build power and bat speed
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our young boys (9 & 8) to help build power for them as well as our 9U travel team. This is a great tool to swing and also hold across their arms positioned straight out to build forearm strength. It's a little pricey for a piece of metal, but it's worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Good for muscle memory training!
customer_reviews.text: Good tool for working on proper swing mechanics without tiring hitter. The lightweight and pro-style grip allows for muscle memory training in drills or soft-toss environment.

customer_reviews.title: great weight for 10-12 yr
customer_reviews.text: Helps with hand and eye coordination. great weight for 10-12 yr.old

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bat to improve bat speed and focus on hand eye coordination
customer_reviews.author: Mark Kapczynski

customer_reviews.title: Great for over/under load training
customer_reviews.text: Great for over/under load training. Only comes with three golf ball size wiffle balls so order more so you can pitch more for the workout.
customer_reviews.author: M.G.

customer_reviews.title: Sklz Overlord bat great training tool.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a skinny weighted bat for my 11yr old son and friends for eye coordination, weight, speed training, hands down this is it. They like it because they are seeing for themselves improvement .Son is 4'10" 79# and works it well . Use Sklz mini balls limited flight for best results.
customer_reviews.author: R.Owens

customer_reviews.title: The think scope of the bat is great, but it would be wonderful if they could ...
customer_reviews.text: Way to big for child age 4-5. Not as light as advertised. The think scope of the bat is great, but it would be wonderful if they could make this in a smaller tee-ball size work children to work on the fundamentals of hitting.
customer_reviews.author: Scott McMillen

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy batting aid
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy batting aid. If possible purchase black and yellow heavier whiffle balls. They work much better than the ones bat comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Juda Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: better swing
customer_reviews.text: This helped me get my swing back. I was in a terrible slump and practicing with this helped me greatly.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my children to help build their arm/shoulder strength and increase bat speed. It also has worked great to help their hand/eye coordination due to the small size. In fact, after a couple weeks, I decided to grab it and try myself and my daughter hit more than I could by about 2 to 1. I would recommend it to any baseball or softball player to help with their batting.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Green

customer_reviews.title: power stick bat
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well to increase our son's batting average, including several home runs in the regionals!

customer_reviews.text: great value our grandson and his friends love it. We would tell everyone to buy this item for baseball players.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the heavier weight is great for son who is currently using 30oz bats

product_meta.title: SKLZ Power Stick Baseball and Softball Training Bat for Strength
feature_bullets: Lightweight bat allows for more swings and less fatigue and improves rotation speed
Improves batter's hand speed, hand-eye coordination and contact
Narrow diameter barrel - small ball training
Durable aluminum design and improved grip
Weighs 12 oz. and is 30" in length
